title: Wrath of Sarugami
function: Regular Parry is disabled, Perfect Parry becomes a chain of 3 attacks.

title: Yoshitsune's Hand
function: Staggering a target has a 30% chance to cause a knock down.

title: Masamune's Edge
function: Melee has 20% chance to deal double damage.

title: Master's Katana
function: Allows switching between any Stance.

title: Stone Striker
function: Improved Heavenly Strike (Extra Damage and Knockback). Costs 1 Resolve.

title: Demon Cutter
function: Staggering a target has a 30% chance to throw nearby enemies.

title: Stone Katana
function: Regular Katana with Stone Stance

title: Water Katana
function: Regular Katana with Water Stance

title: Moon Katana
function: Regular Katana with Moon Stance

title: Wind Katana
function: Regular Katana with Wind Stance

title: The Weightless Spirit
function: Arrows don't descend.

title: Stone-Skipping Bow
function: Headshots ricochet to nearby targets.

title: Heaven's Sting
function: 20% chance to instantly kill non-oni targets.

title: Forbidden Medicine
function: Bombs heal allies.

title: Half-Bow
function: Regular Half-Bow

title: Longbow
function: Regular Longbow

title: Blowgun
function: Regular Blowgun

title: Bomb Pack
function: Regular Bomb Pack

title: Heavenly Rebuke
function: On performing Heavenly Strike, there is a 50% chance for lightning to strike a nearby enemy. Grants Heavenly Strike.

title: Restorative Rhythm
function: Hitting a healing drum will heal all wounded heroes and revive anyone currently downed.

title: Sarugami's Glare
function: Perfect dodge becomes an attack that blinds nearby enemies.

title: Last Breath
function: Instead of taking fatal damage, heal for 50 health. Can occur once every 5 minutes.

title: Benkei's Last Stand
function: 15% chance to ignore arrow damage.

title: Enjo's Remorse
function: Deal 15% bonus damage when at full health.

title: Shogun's Fortitude
function: Grants immunity to flash and poison effects.

title: Sacred Iron
function: Enemies that deal Melee damage to you have Weaken applied to them.

title: Magma Bomb
function: Attaches to an enemy and explodes, Staggering anyone caught in the blast and creating a small smoke cloud.

title: Lady Sanjo's Surprise
function: A Dirt Throw that also has a 15% chance to cause enemies to hallucinate.

title: Spirit Kunai
function: Getting a kill with Kunai lowers all cooldowns on your character by 15 seconds.

title: The Touch of Heaven
function: A Sticky Bomb that also heals allies on hit.

title: Sticky Bomb
function: Regular Sticky Bomb

title: Dirt Throw
function: Regular Dirt Throw

title: Kunai
function: Regular Kunai

title: Bottle of Liquid Courage
function: Refills less health on use, but also refills 1-3 Resolve.

title: The Mist of Yagata
function: A Smoke Bomb that also heals allies in the smoke.

title: Demon Seeds
function: Applies Weaken to affected enemies.

title: Kenji's Shared Brew
function: A Healing Gourd that also heals nearby allies when used.

title: Healing Gourd
function: Regular Healing Gourd

title: Smoke Bomb
function: Regular Smoke Bomb

title: Caltrops
function: Regular Caltrops
